short_description: Score rows of data with a Naive Bayes classifier
long_description: Score rows of data with a Naive Bayes classifier

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: This table defining the input test data.
input_tables.description: This table defining the input test data.

input_tables.name: model
input_tables.rDescription: This table contains the model data.
input_tables.description: This table contains the model data.

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.rDescription: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.rDescription: The name of the database where the input table is located.
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database password of the user.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.rDescription: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.rDescription: The password for the SSL truststore.
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: Model
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the name of the model table generated by the NaiveBayesReduce function.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the model table generated by the NaiveBayesReduce function.

argument_clauses.name: IdCol
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the name of the column that contains the ID that uniquely identifies the test input data.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the column that contains the ID that uniquely identifies the test input data.

argument_clauses.name: CategoricalInputs
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the same categorical_input_columns that you specified when you used the ta.naivebayesmap and ta.naivebayesreduce functions to generate the model table from the training data.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the same categorical_input_columns that you specified when you used the NaiveBayesMap and NaiveBayesReduce functions to generate the model table from the training data.

argument_clauses.name: NumericInputs
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the same numeric_input_columns that you specified when you used the ta.naivebayesmap and ta.naivebayesreduce functions to generate the model table from the training data.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the same numeric_input_columns that you specified when you used the NaiveBayesMap and NaiveBayesReduce functions to generate the model table from the training data.

argument_clauses.name: Responses
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify a list of Responses to output.
argument_clauses.description: Specify a list of Responses to output.
